title: Peer Bumps Configuration
description: Configuration for the bump-peers.ts CLI tool that manages peer dependency bumps in this pnpm monorepo.

$schema.description: Path to the JSON schema file.

excludedFolders.description: Package folders to skip (relative to repo root). Useful for example projects, templates, or archived code.

bumps.description: Intentional peer dependency bumps to apply. These are applied after reverting automatic changesets bumps.

package.description: The package that has the peer dependency (e.g., "@nomicfoundation/hardhat-ethers").

reason.description: Why this bump is intentional. This is for documentation purposes.

version.description: Specific version to set. If omitted, defaults to the peer's current version (the one being released).
